Package frechetDistance

Class FrechetDecider

java.lang.Object
frechetDistance.FrechetDecider
Direct Known Subclasses:
FrechetDeciderPath, FrechetDeciderTabular
abstract class FrechetDecider
extends java.lang.Object
A decider for the fréchet decision problem.

The decision problem is the question whether the fréchet distance of two polygons is less or equal a given distance.

Author:
Anton Ballmaier

  • Constructor Details

    • FrechetDecider

      public FrechetDecider​(Polygon p, Polygon q)
      Constructs a new FrechetDecider object for the two given Polygons. This can solve their decision problem for any distance.
      Parameters:
      p - the first polygon
      q - the second polygon
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given polygons have different dimensionality

  • Method Details

    • freeInterval

      public static double[] freeInterval​(Polygon p, int centerIndex, Polygon q, int segmentIndex, double distance)
      Calculates the section of a line segment which lies within a given distance around a given point.

      The returned array contains two values, measured in local coordinates of the line segment (0 corresponding to the start of the line segment, 1 to it's end). If no point of the line segment lies within the given distance null is returned.

      Parameters:
      p - the polygon that has the center point as vertex
      centerIndex - the index of the center point on p
      q - the polygon that contains the line segment
      segmentIndex - index of the starting point of the line segment
      distance - maximal distance of all point in the returned interval around center
      Returns:
      interval of the section of the line segment which lies within distance around center or null
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given polygons have different dimensionality
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if either of the indices for the center point or line segment are invalid.

    • decideDistance

      public abstract boolean decideDistance​(double distance)
      Decides whether the fréchet distance is less or equal the given distance.
      Parameters:
      distance - the distance to check the fréchet distance against
      Returns:
      true if fréchet distance of p and q is less or equal than distance, false otherwise.

    • endpointsToFar

      public boolean endpointsToFar​(double distance)
      Check if the corresponding endpoints of the two polygons are within reach given a distance of each other.
      Parameters:
      distance - the maximal distance of the endpoints
      Returns:
      true if both starting and endpoints are not further than distance apart, false otherwise
